import React from "react"; import { ScrollContainer, ScrollPage, Animator, batch, Fade, FadeIn, Move, MoveIn, MoveOut, Sticky, StickyIn, ZoomIn } from 'react-scroll-motion' import headerImage from '../../img/header-image.gif' import img0 from '../../img/0.png' import img1 from '../../img/1.png' import img2 from '../../img/2.png' import img3 from '../../img/3.png' import './index.css' const Home = () => { const ZoomInScrollOut = batch(StickyIn(), FadeIn(), ZoomIn()) const work = [ { name: 'project 1', link: '#', code: '#', imageSrc: img0 }, { name: 'project 2', link: '#', code: '#', imageSrc: img1 }, { name: 'project 3', link: '#', code: '#', imageSrc: img2 }, { name: 'project 4', link: '#', code: '#', imageSrc: img3 }, ] return (

Polina

Nazarova

developer

 {/* section 2 */}
Portfolio
) } export default Home;
